content:
This is my research page.
I’m a researcher at the Statistical Machine Learning Group of CSIRO’s Data61.
I have broad research interests in statistical machine learning and deep learning, particularly in the areas of machine learning robustness and generalisation, optimal transport, and Bayesian modelling and inference, in the context of deep learning.
Previously, I obtained my PhD and worked as a research fellow at the Department of Data Science and AI of Monash University.

title: He Zhao
